授業目的: The aim is to discuss and consider how a second language is acquired.
到達目標: Students will acquire basic knowledge about second language acquisition and gain new perspectives on the process of leaning a second language.　The course also helps students learn more about English learning and education by incorporating insights from second language acquisition research, and encourages them to come up with unique ideas and specific methods to teach English.
特記事項:
この科目は、10/10（月）までの授業がオンデマンドで実施される科目です。
10/11（火）以降の授業は対面での実施が決定しました。本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course will be offered on-demand until 10/10（Mon.）.
Classes will be held in a face-to-face format from Monday, 10/11（Tue.） onward.
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Class discussion based on the weekly reading assignment will be the main part of the class work.
